link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Value of Share Capital = (Ordinary Shares + Compulsory Convertible Preference Shares + Preference shares other than Compulsory Convertible)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Reserves and Surplus = [Capital Reserve + Capital Redemption Reserve + Debenture Redemption Reserve + Share Premium + General Reserves + Statutory/Special Reserve (Section 45-IC reserve to be shown separately below item no.(vii)) + Reserves under Sec 45-IC of RBI Act 1934 + Revaluation Reserves + Investment Fluctuation Reserve + Balance of profit and loss account + Share application money pending allotment + Other Reserves (Please provide the details, if any)]" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Secured debentures = (Subscribed by Retail Investors + Subscribed by Mutual Funds + Subscribed by Banks + Subscribed by NBFCs + Subscribed by Insurance Companies + Subscribed by Pension Funds + Others" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Borrowings = (Term Loans + Working Capital Loans + Cash Credit + Overdraft)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Secured Borrowings = (Debentures + Deferred credits + Borrowings from Banks + Borrowings from FIs + Borrowings from Government (State and Central) + Govt. Guaranteed Borrowings + Borrowings from Public Sector Undertakings (PSUs) + Borrowings through CBLO/LAF + Borrowings from RBI + Other Borrowings + Interest accrued but not due on the above)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Unsecured Debentures not in the nature of public deposit = (Subscribed by Retail Investors + Subscribed by Mutual Funds + Subscribed by Banks + Subscribed by NBFCs + Subscribed by Insurance Companies + Subscribed by Pension Funds + Others)" do not tally.

Identity "Total Unsecured Borrowings = (Borrowings from relatives of promoters / directors + Inter-corporate borrowings + Borrowings from Banks + Borrowings from FIs + Borrowings from Public Sector Undertakings (PSUs) + Commercial paper + Debentures not in the nature of public deposit + Money received by way of caution money, margin money from the borrowers, lessee, hires or by way of security or advance from agents in the course of company's business or advance received against orders for supply of goods or properties or for redering services + Subordinated debts + Borrowings from Government (Central & State) + Govt. Guaranteed Borrowings + Call Money Borrowings + Borrowings from RBI + Borrowings from Holding Companies + Other Borrowings + Interest accrued but not due on the above)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Borrowings = (Secured Borrowings + Un-Secured Borrowings)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Borrowings = (Borrowings payable more than 12 months + Borrowings payable more than 3 months but less than or equal to 12 months + Borrowings payable less than or equal to 3 months)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Current Liabilities = (Current Liabilities + Sundry Creditors + Liabilities to Subsidiaries and Holding Companies + Deferred Tax Liabilities (Net) + Others)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Provisions = (Provision for Standard Assets + Provisions Held for Non-Performing Assets + Provision for Diminution on Investments + For taxation + For contingencies + For pension, gratuity and similar staff benefit schemes + Proposed dividends + Others)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Capital and Liabilities = (Share Capital + Reserves and Surplus + Secured Borrowings + Unsecured Borrowings + Current liabilities + Provisions + Public deposits 8. Other liabilities)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Capital and Liabilities of Sheet 1 = Value of Assets of Sheet 2" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total NPAs = Sub-standard assets + Doubtful assets + Loss assets)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Gross NPAs (%) = [(Total NPAs * 100)/ Gross credit exposure, if Gross Credit Exposure > 0; Else Value of Gross NPAs (%) = 0]" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Net Credit Exposure = [Gross credit exposure - Total Provision Held; Else Value of Net Credit Exposure = 0, if Gross credit exposure < Total Provision Held]" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Net NPAs % = [Net NPAs * 100) / Net credit exposure, if Net Credit Exposure > 0; Else Value of Net NPAs % = 0]" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Fund based exposure = Values reported for all banks/NBFCs and other financial entities)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total fund based exposure = (Values reported for Term loan + Working capital + Debentures + Commercial papers + ICDs + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Non fund based exposure = (Values reported for all banks/NBFCs and other financial entities)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Fund based exposure = (Sum of Values reported for all Group/Associate/Related companies/Entities)" do not tally.
Identity "Total fund based exposure = (Loans + Equity + Preference + Debentures + ICDs + CPs + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Non Fund based exposure = (Sum of Values reported for all Group/Associate/Related companies/Entities)" do not tally.
Identity "Total Non fund based exposure = (LCs + Guarantees + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Equity shares = (Foreign Institutional Investors + Foreign Direct Investments)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total foreign sources = (Equity shares + Borrowings + Bonds/Debentures + Others)" do not tally.
Value reported for 'Total foreign sources' in Part 7 Sheet < or = 'Total Capital and Liabilities' in Part 1 Sheet.

Identity "Value of Total Advances to Capital Market = (Advances against securities (Individuals) + Advances to individuals on clean basis + Advances against securities (Corporates) + Advances to corporates on clean basis for meeting promoter's contribution to the equity of new companies in anticipation of raising resources + Advances to stockbrokers + Bridge loans to companies against expected equity flows / issues + All exposures to Venture Capital Funds + Other fund based advance to Capital Market)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Financial Guarantees = (Financial Guarantees Issued to Stock Exchanges on Behalf of Stock Brokers + Other Financial Guarantees)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Investments in Capital Market = (Convertible Bonds and Debentures + Equities + Equity Oriented Mutual Funds + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Capital Market Exposure = (Advances to Capital Market (Fund based) + Advances to Capital Market (Non-fund based) + Investments in Capital Market)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Credit to Real Estate = (Fund based exposure + Non fund based exposure)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Direct exposure to real estate sector = (Residential Mortgages + Commercial Real Estate + Any Other)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Residential Mortgages = (Residential Mortgages - Individual Housing Loans + Residential Mortgages - All Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Commercial Real Estate = (Commercial Real Estate - Residential Housing (CRE-RH) + Commercial Real Estate - Other)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Indirect exposure to real estate sector = (Funded and Non-funded Exposures NHB and Housing Finance Companies(HFCs) + Any Other)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Investment= (Direct + Indirect)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Direct = (Commercial Real Estate + Investments in MBS and other securitized exposures + Any Other)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Indirect = (Funded and Non-funded Exposures NHB and Housing Finance Companies(HFCs) + Any Other)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Investments in MBS and other securitized exposures = (Residential Real Estate + Commercial Real Estate)" do not tally.
Number of accounts' reported in Part 9 Sheet for Industry = 'Number of accounts for Total Industry credit' in Part 9A Sheet.
Total Advances (outstanding)' in Part 9 Sheet for Industry = 'Total Advances (outstanding)' for Total Industry credit in Part 9A Sheet.
Standard advances' in Part 9 Sheet for Industry = 'Standard advances' in Part 9A Sheet for Total Industry credit.
Substandard advances' in Part 9 Sheet for Industry = Substandard advances in Part 9A Sheet for Total Industry credit.
Doubtful advances in Part 9 Sheet for Industry = Doubtful advances in Part 9A Sheet for Total Industry credit.
Loss advances' in Part 9 Sheet for Industry = 'Loss advances' in Part 9 A Sheet for Total Industry credit.
Restructured standard advances in Part 9 Sheet for Industry = Restructured standard advances in Part 9A Sheet for Total Industry credit.

Identity "Value of Number of accounts for Total Industries = (Mining and Quarrying (incl. Coal) + Food Processing + Beverage and Tobacco + Textiles + Leather and Leather Products + Wood and Wood Products + Paper and Paper Products + Petroleum, Coal Products and Nuclear Fuels + Chemicals and Chemical Products + Rubber, Plastic and their Products + Glass and Glassware + Cement and Cement Products + Basic Metal and Metal Product + All Engineering + Vehicles, Vehicle Parts and Transport Equipment + Gems and Jewellery + Construction + Infrastructure + Other Industries" do not tally.

Identity "Value of No. of Accounts for Infrastructure = (Power + Telecommunications + Roads + Airports + Solid Waste Management + Water Treatment Plants + Electricity Generation + Electricity Transmission + Electricity Distribution + Solar Renewal Energy + Other Infrastructure)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total Industries credit amount = (Mining and Quarrying (incl. Coal) + Food Processing + Beverage and Tobacco + Textiles + Leather and Leather Products + Wood and Wood Products + Paper and Paper Products + Petroleum, Coal Products and Nuclear Fuels + Chemicals and Chemical Products + Rubber, Plastic and their Products + Glass and Glassware + Cement and Cement Products + Basic Metal and Metal Product + All Engineering + Vehicles, Vehicle Parts and Transport Equipment + Gems and Jewellery + Construction + Infrastructure + Other Industries" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Infrastructure = (Power + Telecommunications + Roads + Airports + Solid Waste Management + Water Treatment Plants + Electricity Generation + Electricity Transmission + Electricity Distribution + Solar Renewal Energy + Other Infrastructure)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Number of accounts of gross advances = (Food Credit + Non-Food Credit)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Gross Advances = (Food Credit + Non-Food Credit)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Number of accounts of Non-Food Credit = (Agriculture and Allied Activities + Industry + Services + Retail Loans + Other Non-food Credit, if any)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Non-Food Credit amount = (Agriculture and Allied Activities + Industry + Services + Retail Loans + Other Non-food Credit, if any)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Number of accounts of Industry = (Micro and Small + Medium + Large + Others, if any)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Industry amount = (Micro and Small + Medium + Large + Others, if any)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Services = (Transport Operators + Computer Software + Tourism, Hotel and Restaurants + Shipping + Professional Services + Trade + Commercial Real Estate + NBFCs + Aviation + Other Services)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Services amount = (Transport Operators + Computer Software + Tourism, Hotel and Restaurants + Shipping + Professional Services + Trade + Commercial Real Estate + NBFCs + Aviation + Other Services)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Number of accounts of Services = (Micro and Small + Medium + Large + Others, if any)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Services amount = (Micro and Small + Medium + Large + Others, if any)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Number of accounts of Retail Loans = (Housing Loans (incl. priority sector Housing) + Consumer Durables + Credit Card Receivables + Vehicle/Auto Loans + Education Loans + Advances against Fixed Deposits (incl. FCNR(B), etc.) + Advances to Individuals against Shares, Bonds + Advances to Individuals against Gold + Micro finance loan/SHG Loanand + Other Retail loans , if any)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Retail Loans amount = (Housing Loans (incl. priority sector Housing) + Consumer Durables + Credit Card Receivables + Vehicle/Auto Loans + Education Loans + Advances against Fixed Deposits (incl. FCNR(B), etc.) + Advances to Individuals against Shares, Bonds + Advances to Individuals against Gold + Micro finance loan/SHG Loanand + Other Retail loans , if any)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Number of accounts of Trade = (Wholesale Trade (other than Food Procurement) + Retail Trade)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Trade amount = (Wholesale Trade (other than Food Procurement) + Retail Trade)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Gross Advances (II+III) under column 'Total Advances (Outstanding) - Funded' in Part 9 Sheet = Value of Gross Credit Exposure under column 'Loans and Advances Outstanding + Interest Overdue' in Part 9B Sheet" do not tally.
Standard Advances' in Part 9 Sheet = 'Standard Assets' reported in Part 9B Sheet.
Substandard Advances' in Part 9 Sheet = 'SubStandard Assets' reported in Part 9B Sheet.
Doubtful Advances in Part 9 Sheet = Doubtful Assets in Part 9B sheet.
Loan Advances' in Part 9 Sheet = 'Loss Assets' in Part 9B sheet.
Total Loan Assets (Fund based)' in Part 8 Sheet = 'Loans and Advances to Companies in the Group' in Part 2 Sheet.

Identity "Commercial Papers = (Subscribed by Retail Investors + Subscribed by Mutual Funds + Subscribed by Banks + Subscribed by NBFCs + Subscribed by Insurance Companies + Subscribed by Pension Funds + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Authorised Capital = (Equity Share Capital + Preference Share Capital)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Advances against securities (Individuals) = (Against shares + Against bonds and debentures + Advances against other securities)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Advances against securities (Corporates) = (Against shares + Against bonds and debentures + Advances against other securities)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Advances to individuals on clean basis = (For investment in shares + For investment in IPOs + For investment in ESOPs + Convertible bonds and debentures + For investment in units of equity-oriented mutual funds)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Advances to stockbrokers = (Secured + Unsecured)" do not tally.

If the user selects ‘No’ for “Whether Call / Put Option is Enabled”, then next three columns, i.e. ‘Type of Option’ ‘If Yes, Whether the Call / Put Option is Exercised’ ‘Date of Exercise of Call / Put Option’ should be empty.

If the user selects ‘No’ for “Whether Call / Put Option is Enabled”, then next three columns, i.e. ‘Type of Option’, ‘If Yes, Whether the Call / Put Option is Exercised’, ‘Date of Exercise of Call / Put Option’ should be empty.

Identity "If the user selects ‘No’ for “Whether the Group Associate / Subsidiary Company is registered with RBI as NBFC?”, then next column ‘If Yes, Please provide the NBFC Code of NBFC’ should be empty" do not tally.
Identity ""Value of Total Sanctioned Loan Amount = (Disbursed Loan Amount + Un-disbursed Loan Amount in Annex09)"" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Amount Outstanding = (Total Principal Outstanding Amount + Total Accrued Interest in Annex09 sheet)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Gross NPAs at end of the quarter” = [Gross NPAs at beginning of the quarter + New Accretion to NPAs from Standard Advances during this quarter + Reduction (-) / Addition due to RBI Instructions and/or any other Reason during this quarter - Up-gradation during this quarter - Actual Recoveries (in this quarter - Write-off amount (in this quarter)]" do not tally.
If the user selects ‘No’ for “Whether the Call / Put Option is Exercised”, then next column ‘Date of Exercise of Call / Put Option’ should be empty.
Identity "Value of Net NPAs = [Gross NPAs - Total provision held; Else Value of Net NPAs = 0, if Total NPAs < Total Provision held]" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Provision held for NPA = (Sub-standard assets + Doubtful assets + Loss assets)" do not tally.
If the user selects ‘No’ for “Whether the Call / Put Option is Exercised’”, then next column ‘Date of Exercise of Call / Put Option’ should be empty.
Identity "Value of Inter-corporate borrowings = (From Group Entities + From Non-Group Entities)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Fixed Assets = (Fixed Assets Tangible + Intangible Assets + Capital work in Progress)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Investment in Companies in the Group = (Quoted Current Investment + Unquoted Current Investment + Quoted Long-Term Investment + Unquoted Long-Term Investment)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Quoted Current Investment = (Equity Shares + Preference Shares + Debentures and Bonds + Others, please specify)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Unquoted Current Investment = (Equity Shares + Preference Shares + Debentures and Bonds + Others, please specify)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Quoted Long Term Investment = (Equity Shares + Preference Shares + Debentures and Bonds + Others, please specify)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Unquoted Long Term Investment = (Equity Shares + Preference Shares + Debentures and Bonds + Others, please specify)" do not tally.
Identity "Loans and Advances to Companies in the Group = (Current Loans and Advances + Long Term Loans and Advances)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Current Loans and Advances = (Secured + Unsecured)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Current Loans and Advances - Secured = (Unquoted Debentures and Bonds + Loans and Advances)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Current Loans and Advances - Unsecured = (Unquoted Debentures and Bonds + Loans and Advances)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Long Term Loans and Advances = (Secured + Unsecured)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Long Term Loans and Advances - Secured = (Unquoted Debentures and Bonds + Loans and Advances)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Long Term Loans and Advances - Unsecured = (Unquoted Debentures and Bonds + Loans and Advances)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Other Investments = (Quoted Current Investment + Unquoted Current Investment + Other Long Term Investments)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Quoted Other Current Investment = (Government Securities including Treasury Bills + Units of Mutual Funds + Money Market Instruments + Money Market MFs + Liquid MFs + Other Money Market Instruments + Others)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Unquoted Other Current Investment = (Government Securities including Treasury Bills + Units of Mutual Funds + Money Market Instruments + Money Market MFs + Liquid MFs + Other Money Market Instruments + Others)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Investment = Investment in Companies in the Group + Other Investments)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Cash and Bank Balances = (Cash in hand + Current A/c Balance + Earmarked balances with bank + Certificate of Deposits)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Income accrued from investments = (Income accrued from dividend on shares of corporate bodies + Income accrued from bonds and debentures of corporate bodies + Income accrued from Government securities/bonds + Income accrued on securities of corporate bodies or public sector undertakings, the payment of interest and repayment of principal of which have been guaranteed by Central Government or a State Government + Others)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Other Assets = (Sundry/ Trade debtors + Advance Payments of Taxes + Security Deposits + Stock in trade + Share application money + Prepaid expenses + Loans and Advances to Staff + Other Advances + Other Receivables + Stamp Duty Recoverable + Input Credit Receivable + Assets acquired in satisfaction of debt + Others)" do not tally.

Identity (Value of Gross Total Asset = Fixed Assets + Investment in Companies in the Group + Loans and Advances to Companies in the Group + Other Investments + Cash and Bank Balances + Income accrued from investments + Income overdue on Investments + Interest overdue on Loans and Advances + Deferred Tax Payment + Other Assets + Accumulated loss)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Net Assets = [Gross Total Asset - (Cash and Bank Balances + Deferred Tax Payment + Advance Payments of Taxes + Investment in money market instruments & mutual funds)]" do not tally.
Reporting of 'Remarks for Other Quoted Current Investment' is mandatory.
Reporting of 'Remarks for Other Unquoted Current Investment' is mandatory.
Reporting of 'Remarks for Other Quoted Long Term Investment' is mandatory.
Reporting of 'Remarks for Other Unquoted Long Term Investment' is mandatory.
Reporting of 'Remarks for Other Money Market Instruments Under Quoted Current Investment' is mandatory.
Reporting of 'Remarks for Others Under Quoted Current Investment in Other Investments' is mandatory.
Reporting of 'Remarks for Other Money Market Instruments Under Unquoted Current Investment' is mandatory.
Reporting of 'Remarks for Others Under Unquoted Current Investment in Other Investments' is mandatory.
Reporting of 'Remarks for Other Income Accrued from Investments' is mandatory.
Reporting of 'Remarks for Other Assets' is mandatory.
Total Loan Assets (Fund based)' > or = 'Exposure to Infrastructure Finance'.
"Total Off-Balance sheet items (Non fund based)" > or = "Exposure to Infrastructure Finance".
Income from Loan Assets' > or = 'Income from Infrastructure Finance'.
"Total Investments" > or = "Exposure to Infrastructure Finance".
"Income from Investments" > or = "Income from Infrastructure Finance".
Total Investments' in Part 8 Sheet = 'Total Investment' in Part 2 Sheet.
Income from Investments' in Part 8 Sheet = 'Income accrued from investments' in Part 2 Sheet.
Reporting of "Remarks for Others Industry" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Remarks for Other Services" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Remarks for Other Retail Loans" is mandatory.
Reporting of "Remarks for Other Non-food Credit" is mandatory.
